title: Christmas Coffee Spoons Set of 8, Gold Dessert Spoons with Gift Box, Espresso Spoons Ice Cream Spoon for Christmas Party Decor Tableware

Perfect for tea, coffee, dessert, soup, stirring, and mixing, these spoons are suitable for all occasions, from Christmas parties to family gatherings, cafes, breakfast feasts, and weddings.
